mapper.insert: insert into question (id, qt_id, use_yn, open_yn, rgst_id, rgst_dt, uptsr_id, uptsr_dt, passage, main, main_id, control_no, waiting_time, audio_time, answer_time, assign_cnt, stare_cnt, correct_cnt, answer_type, keyword, mediatags, point, answer_cnt, header_text, question, sch_lvl_code, grade_code, grd_group_code, term_code, subj_code, unit_code, unit, session_code, "session", sub1session_code, sub1session, topic_code, topic, domain_code, sub_domain_code, ach_code, sub_ach, sub_ach_rubric, eval_standard_code, eval_stand_rubric, func_code, comp_domain_code, comp_domain, key_concept_code, general_code, contents_code, diff_code, ques_anst, origin_id) values ();
